txt.en: Dawn, 30th Day of my Exile\n\nGalachán raved through the night about whispers and promises to the Dark. I do not think I got a moment of sleep. I also discovered that he instructed the messenger boy to destroy my missives to Dûn Traikh! All the times I tried to explain to them that Galachán is mad, my requests for support – tossed into the fire. I am livid, but must continue to pretend I know nothing of Galachán's deeds. The threats he makes in his moments of clarity… I shall continue my work. He mustn't know that I know.
